name: From The Sky: New Horizon
description:
From The Sky tells the adventures of two sisters Yuki and Karma, who travel through time and space through the portal. From the Jurassic world to world wars, from ocean to space. But nothing is safe, for each world there are different dangerous obstacles, let's help them overcome obstacles safely.

One day, Karma and Yuki are on their way back home after the grueling adventure. After that, a sudden accident occurred and instead of returning home, they had to go on another adventure. Let's help them complete the adventure with the help of the portal!



The gameplay is very simple, just use the right and left buttons to make the character fly forward or backward. There are many obstacles on the way and we must overcome it. Once we have overcome these obstacles, we will meet hearts called checkpoint, when we die we will appear at this checkpoint. The maximum life of a player is 5. The game ends when you reach the portal to take you to another world.

In the minigame, you will also overcome obstacles and you only score points when you enter the portal. The portal will appear everywhere on the map, each time you enter the portal you will get 100 points and you will be randomly taken to another world and continue to adventure. The game ends when you touch obstacles and you start playing again because you have only one life.



FEATURES:
- Simple Control System
- Graphics Are Relatively Stable
- High Difficulty
- Great Soundtrack
- Female Protagonist
- 4 Maps
- Minigame
- Trading card will be available soon
